text: 13.21 Gal 1.5, Plp 2.13, 2 Te 2.17, 1 Pi 5.10 Pen God nop anɨgɨl agnepin, ne nɨbop dɨtep gɨl kod mɨdaknɨŋ, gos ne mɨdupsek yɨpɨd gɨl kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb tek lup. Abe agnepin, ne Jisas Klays nop gos nɨŋɨd chɨnop gek, gos ne ke nɨŋɨd anɨb agup tek gɨnɨgun. Pen Klays nop yɨb awl ñɨnɨgun, pel pelnep ñɨlɨg yonɨgun. Yaw.
